channel.title: Hack on None
channel.description: Recent content in Hack on None

item.title: HackAThon: howto tcpdump to retrieve some infos
item.description:
We now have an address to connect to. We don’t know what to so with it, but it might lead to an hidden password ;)

Let’s do it.

item.title: HackAThon: howto hack a small, C compiled software
item.description:
During the last Hackathon, we were asked to do some challenges, just for fun. One of them forced us to hack a small binary to get an address and use tcpdump to get a password.

How the hell am I supposed to do?
